name: kamikaze
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ before noun ] A kamikaze attack is a sudden violent attack on an enemy, especially one in which the person or people attacking know that they will be killed: a kamikaze attack/mission
being willing to take risks and not worrying about safety: kamikaze taxi drivers a kamikaze attitude
